'Real deal' KKR deserved playoffs spot i.content: KKR became the first team this season to achieve qualification after they beat MI at the Eden Gardens on Saturday, 11 May.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full ScheduleKKR became the first team to seal their place in the IPL 2024 Playoffs as they defeated MI at the Eden Gardens, Kolkata on May 11, Saturday.Another win in their remaining two games will seal their spot in the top two and head to the qualifier 1 of the playoffs.KKR has been one of the early pace-setters this season along with RR as they have continued been the top two for most of the season.Anyone on their given day can win the game," Mike Hesson said on Jio Cinema after KKR's win vs MI.

Bowl slow, bowl wide: Rayudu analyses Su.content: On Saturday, the MI batter tried to manufacture a shot from outside the off-stump off Andre Russell but hit the ball straight down the throat of Ramandeep Singh.The veteran said that the 33-year-old batter needs to up his game in terms of playing balls outside the off-stump.Analysing the MI batters' technique, Rayudu said that bowlers can trouble Suryakumar by bowling wide outside the off-stump and making him hit towards the longer boundary.‘Lack of batsmanship cost MI’Rayudu reckoned that MI were let down by their poor batting against KKR.After being asked to chase down a target of 158 in a truncated 16-over match, Mumbai got off to a stupendous start courtesy of a 65-run stand for the opening wicket between Rohit Sharma and Ishan KishanBut once Sunil Narine dismissed a well-set Kishan, the MI innings went downhill.

Nitish Rana opens up on ‘sleepless’ nigh.content: However, a night before his comeback, he couldn’t sleep due to anxiety and as he felt like playing his first IPL game.To be honest, I couldn’t sleep the whole night, it felt as if I was going to play the first game of the IPL because I was suddenly included in the team after ten great games.Speaking about his time away from the game, the Delhi-born cricketer revealed that he couldn’t even touch the bat for the first 20-odd days and was visualising himself bating.Notably, the 30-year-old featured in the first game for his team against SRH before a finger injury ruled him out of the next ten matches.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full Schedule“For the first 20-22 days I didn’t even touch the bat due to injury.

James Anderson: A purist that made us fa.content: ” Lord’s will be buzzing when Anderson steps out against the West Indies, one last time in international cricket, later this year in July.Although reality would dictate that it’s almost time, the mere thought that England, one day, would be without their enigmatic duo, Stuart Broad and James Anderson, sent shivers down the spine.For 21 long years, Anderson carried Test cricket on his own shoulders, and there was nothing that could detach him from his favourite sport.17 per cent of Anderson’s 700 Test wickets have come at the Home of Cricket and hence, it does not come as a surprise why he chose Lord’s for his swansong.Anyway, regardless of what happens at Lord’s, Anderson may go down as someone whose records in Tests may be tough to break in the next century.

KKR can win IPL, Sunil Narine, Varun Cha.content: In a rain-curtailed game, KKR beat MI by 18 runs, owing to some superb bowling from Sunil Narine and Varun Chakravarthy.Chakravarthy was named player of the match for his spell of 2/17 in his four overs, which helped KKR restrict MI to just 139/8 in their chase of 158 runs.KKR vs MI, IPL 2024: Highlights | Match ReportChawla also felt that KKR have it in them to win the IPL 2024 due to the team's overall form in the tournament.Because at the end of the day, it's a team game.You just need four overs to change the game in the IPL.

CSK are set to play their final home game of the Indian Premier League 2024 season on Sunday, May 12.The match against RR could also turn out to be MS Dhoni's final game at home if CSK do not manage to qualify for the playoffs this season.com/uV3k6BVEzx

Don't 'needle' players like Virat Kohli,.content:
A wounded athlete is dangerous
Hayden said he is happy to see that the criticism has fueled the fire inside Kohli to get better and claimed the RCB star is a wounded athlete at the moment and it could be dangerous for the opposition.Hayden, while talking to Star Sports, said that there was always going to be strike-rate criticism directed at Kohli as he is a very conventional and technical player, who takes the game deep in all formats of the game.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full Schedule Hayden feels that Kohli listened to the criticism and went about with his business of getting better in the middle phases against spin."You know, those middle phases being that 138 strike-rate against spin, that's critical for India because international sides they'll line up with spin.Every side will have two, sometimes three spinners as their resource, and they'll use it to slow down a Kohli who, inside that powerplay has got such a huge energy and momentum and creates great pressure on opposition," said Hayden.

KKR vs MI: Refreshing to see Venkatesh I.content: Varun Aaron heaped praise on Venkatesh Iyer for taking the attack to Jasprit Bumrah during KKR’s IPL 2024 match against MI on Saturday, May 11 at the iconic Eden Gardens in Kolkata.KKR vs MI, IPL 2024: Highlights“It was refreshing to see a batter take the attack to Bumrah and not actually play him out, which was really nice because he took some risks,” Aaron told ESPNcricinfo.428, KKR are also close to finishing the league stage in the top 2, thereby taking part in the Qualifier 1.Rather, he took the attack to him, which was great,” Aaron added.“He stepped down the wicket, made some room for himself , he just wasn’t in that mindset, ‘You know what, this is Bumrah, I am going to play him out’.

KKR vs MI: How Varun Chakaravarthy 'meti.content: He (Narine) bowls in front of the hand.I bowl from the back of my hand.

Hardik Pandya gracefully accepts KKR def.content: Hardik Pandya said that MI failed to capitalise on the good start in their run-chase against KKR, leading to their defeat.Hardik lauded the bowlers for restricting the Knight Riders in good batting conditions, but admitted that MI have not been up to the mark throughout.Just want to go and enjoy, play good cricket.That's been the motto from the start but we haven't played enough good cricket,” Hardik added.After being asked to chase down 158 in a rain-curtailed 16-over match, MI finished with 139 for 8.

KKR vs MI: Shreyas Iyer 'manifested' Kol.content: Speaking after the 18-run win, Shreyas said that they did have the nerves before the game but was happy to see his side step up and praised the game-changers in the squad.With the game being reduced to a 16-over-per-side match, only one bowler could bowl 4.KKR vs MI: Highlights | Scorecard"I think I manifested this before the game (on becoming the 1st side to qualifty for the playoffs).The KKR skipper also hailed the character shown by his side to bounce back after MI had a great start to their chase.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full Schedule"I wasn't thinking about stats or records, the weather wasn't great but we won the game and that's what is more important.
